biotools.summary: Tool for uncovering multiple peptides and nucleic acids binding specificities from sequence data. MUSI provides a simple interface for processing short peptides or nucleic acid sequence data. Starting from a set of sequences observed to bind to a given target, it automatically generates an optimal number of motifs based on the different specificity patterns present in the data.
